name: Stock Technical Analysis
description: Fetches historical stock data from Tiingo and calculates basic technical indicators (SMA, RSI, MACD, ATR, etc.), then returns a structured analysis of the trend.
author: Shinkai

tiingo_api_key.description: Valid Tiingo API key for data access. Falls back to TIINGO_API_KEY env var if not provided

symbol.description: Stock ticker symbol (e.g., AAPL, MSFT). Must be valid symbol on supported exchanges

lookback_days.description: Number of historical trading days to analyze (1-3650). More data gives better trends. Default: 365

analysis.description: Technical indicators: SMAs (20/50/200), RSI, MACD, ATR, volume. Boolean flags show trend signals
